pp-value-1.value: Semapa – Sociedade de Investimento e Gestão, SGPS, S.A.

pp-value-6.value: Av. Fontes Pereira de Melo, 14, 10º Piso, Lisboa

pp-value-8.value: Semapa leads an Enterprise Group with activities in three distinct business segments: pulp and paper, cement and derivatives,and environment, developed respectively through its subsidiaries The Navigator Company (“Navigator” or “Navigator Group”),Secil – Companhia Geral de Cal e Cimento, S.A. (“Secil” or “Secil Group”) and ETSA – Investimentos, SGPS, S.A. (“ETSA” or “ETSAGroup”).Semapa also holds a venture capital business unit, carried out through its subsidiary Semapa Next, S.A., whose objective is topromote investments in startups and venture capital funds with high growth potential.
